analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/45/0x63cfb4af5a19ed135a21e000f1a8950c0ccd2def.sol:
	Contract IronCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/45/0x63cfb4af5a19ed135a21e000f1a8950c0ccd2def.sol#397-399)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/45/0x63cfb4af5a19ed135a21e000f1a8950c0ccd2def.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/45/0x63cfb4af5a19ed135a21e000f1a8950c0ccd2def.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/45/0x63cfb4af5a19ed135a21e000f1a8950c0ccd2def.sol#157-159) is not in mixedCase
